title: Edho Ninaivugal Song Lyrics Agal Vilakku
stanzas:
Yetho ...
ninaivugal kanavugal
manadhile malarudhe
kaaveri oottraagave
kaatrodu kaatraagave
dhinam kaanbadhu thaan
yedho..

ninaivugal kanavugal
manadhile malarudhe
kaaveri oottraagave
kaatrodu kaatraagave
dhinam kaanbadhu thaan yedho..

Maarbinil naanum
maaraamal serum
kaalam thaan vendum
mmm mmm mmm

vaanveli engum
en kadhal geetham
vazhum naal vendum
mmmm mmm mmm

theavaigal ellaam
theeraatha neram
thaevan nee vendum
serum naal vendum

Yetho ninaivugal kanavugal
manadhile malarudhe
kaaveri oottraagave
kaatrodu kaatraagave

Naadiya sondham
naan kaanum bandham
indrum perinbam
mm mmm mmm

naal oru vannam
naan kaanum ennam
aahaa aanandham
mm mmmm mmm

kaatrinil sellum
en kadhal ennam
yaengum ennaalum
yaekkam ullaadum
